Advanced System Optimizer v3.5.1000.15559 Final is a software solution for configuring and optimizing the performance of your system . The program includes more than 30 different tools to improve the performance and speed of your operating system. With this program you can clean your hard drive of unnecessary files and various debris , performed cleaning and defragmenting the registry , delete sensitive data ( cookies , history sites , cache and all other traces of your activity) , and create a backup of system files and if necessary , to restore.

Features:
=========

- Removal of empty and unneeded files from your system

Advanced System Optimizer v3.5.1000.15559 Final has a collection of new utilities to give you better gaming environment, keep your drivers up-to-date, protect your computer from spyware, and tweak settings to improve performance. The exquisite interface and the single click solution can make your working simpler.
